solution_line_template: Twice the distance of Ricciana's jump is {ricciana_jump} x {twice} = <<{ricciana_jump}*{twice}={twice_ricciana_jump}>>{twice_ricciana_jump} feet.
Margarita ran and jumped for {margarita_run} + {margarita_jump} = <<{margarita_run}+{margarita_jump}={margarita_total}>>{margarita_total} feet in all.
So, Margarita ran and jumped {margarita_total} - {ricciana_total} = <<{margarita_total}-{ricciana_total}={difference}>>{difference} foott more than Ricciana.
